gaffer.function

Interface Function

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgeOff, AggregateFunction, And, AreEqual, ArrayListConcat, ComparableMax, ComparableMin, Concat, ConsumerFunction, ConsumerProducerFunction, ExampleFilterFunction, ExampleTransformFunction, Exists, FilterFunction, FreqMapAggregator, HyperLogLogPlusAggregator, HyperLogLogPlusIsLessThan, IntegerFreqMapAggregator, IsA, IsEqual, IsFalse, IsIn, IsLessThan, IsMoreThan, IsShorterThan, IsTrue, IsXLessThanY, IsXMoreThanY, MapContains, MapFilter, Max, MeanTransform, Min, MultiFilterFunction, MultiRegex, Not, NumericAggregateFunction, Or, ProducerFunction, Product, Regex, SetAggregator, SimpleAggregateFunction, SimpleFilterFunction, SimpleTransformFunction, StarRatingTransform, StringConcat, Sum, TransformFunction, VisibilityAggregator

    public interface Function
    A Function is a (potentially configurable) logical operation. Function interfaces are loosely defined (intentionally) to enable functions to be invoked generically without introspection.

    Functions may consume input and/or produce output records.

    See Also:
    ConsumerFunction, ConsumerProducerFunction, ProducerFunction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Function statelessClone()
      Create a deep copy of this Function, including any configuration values.

    • Method Detail

      • statelessClone

        Function statelessClone()
        Create a deep copy of this Function, including any configuration values. Stateful functions should have their state initialised.
        Returns:
        Deep copy of this Function.
